data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Lunda Sul, Angola.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lunda Sul, Angola
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 354,014 people in the state of Lunda Sul who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Lunda Sul.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Lunda Sul, Angola to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, 0.7% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Pour your Spirit out on the 516,100 citizens of Lunda Sul, Angola, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Lunda Sul, Angola.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Lunda Sul, Angola to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

location.name: Lunda Sul
location.people_groups_list: Simaa-Makoma, Vasekela Bushman, Maligo, Holu, Masi, Ndombe
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Simaa-Makoma (3,700), Vasekela Bushman, Maligo (1,500), Holu (54,000), Masi (4,900), Ndombe (49,000)
